mapper.sql: ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, NAME, CODE, URL, TYPE, PARENT_ID, STATUS
mapper.select: select O.NAME AS menuName,O.CODE AS menuCode,O.URL AS url,O.TYPE AS type,O.PARENT_ID AS parentId FROM FR_MG_ROLE_PREM T LEFT JOIN FR_MG_PERMISSION O ON T.PERM_ID=O.ID WHERE O.STATUS='1' AND T.ROLD_ID=#{roleId} ORDER BY O.CODE ASC

select O.NAME AS menuName,O.CODE AS menuCode,O.URL AS url,O.TYPE AS type,O.PARENT_ID AS parentId FROM FR_MG_ROLE_PREM T LEFT JOIN FR_MG_PERMISSION O ON T.PERM_ID=O.ID WHERE O.STATUS='1' ORDER BY T.CODE ASC
SELECT T.NAME AS MENUNAME,T.CODE AS MENUCODE,T.URL AS URL,T.TYPE AS TYPE,T.PARENT_ID AS PARENTID FROM FR_MG_PERMISSION T WHERE T.STATUS='1' ORDER BY T.CODE ASC
mapper.insert: insert into FR_MG_PERMISSION (ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, NAME, CODE, URL, TYPE, PARENT_ID, STATUS) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into FR_MG_PERMISSION
ID,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATE_TIME,
NAME,
CODE,
URL,
TYPE,
PARENT_ID,
STATUS,

mapper.update:
update FR_MG_PERMISSION
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NAME = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update FR_MG_PERMISSION set CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NAME = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
